wikipedia_page.main: William Isaac Sarvis (July 1898 – 22 March 1968) was a Welsh footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Merthyr Tydfil. He played for Aberdare Athletic, Merthyr Town, Manchester United, Bradford City and Walsall.
